entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
